verses.text: \w The|strong="G1161"\w* \w first|strong="G1520"\w* \add day\add* of the \w week|strong="G4521"\w* \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w Magdalene|strong="G3094"\w* \w early|strong="G4404"\w*, when it \w was|strong="G5607"\w* \w yet|strong="G2089"\w* \w dark|strong="G4653"\w*, \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w sepulchre|strong="G3419"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w seeth|strong="G0991"\w* the \w stone|strong="G3037"\w* taken \w away|strong="G0142"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w sepulchre|strong="G3419"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* she \w runneth|strong="G5143"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* the \w other|strong="G0243"\w* \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w loved|strong="G5368"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, They have taken \w away|strong="G0142"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w sepulchre|strong="G3419"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* we \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w where|strong="G4226"\w* they have \w laid|strong="G5087"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* went \w forth|strong="G1831"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w other|strong="G0243"\w* \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w sepulchre|strong="G3419"\w*.

\w So|strong="G1161"\w* they \w ran|strong="G5143"\w* \w both|strong="G1417"\w* \w together|strong="G3674"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w other|strong="G0243"\w* \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w* did \w outrun|strong="G4390"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w sepulchre|strong="G3419"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he stooping \w down|strong="G3879"\w*, \add and looking in\add*, \w saw|strong="G0991"\w* the linen \w clothes|strong="G3608"\w* \w lying|strong="G2749"\w*; \w yet|strong="G3305"\w* went \w he|strong="G1525"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w in|strong="G1525"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w following|strong="G0190"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w sepulchre|strong="G3419"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w seeth|strong="G2334"\w* the linen \w clothes|strong="G3608"\w* \w lie|strong="G2749"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w napkin|strong="G4676"\w*, \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w about|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w head|strong="G2776"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w lying|strong="G2749"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* the linen \w clothes|strong="G3608"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* wrapped \w together|strong="G1794"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* a \w place|strong="G5117"\w* by \w itself|strong="G5565"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* went \w in|strong="G1525"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* that \w other|strong="G0243"\w* \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w sepulchre|strong="G3419"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w saw|strong="G1492"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* as \w yet|strong="G3764"\w* they \w knew|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3764"\w* the \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* rise \w again|strong="G0450"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*.
\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* went \w away|strong="G0565"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* their own \w home|strong="G1438"\w*.

¶ \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w without|strong="G1854"\w* \w at|strong="G4314"\w* the \w sepulchre|strong="G3419"\w* \w weeping|strong="G2799"\w*: \w and|strong="G3767"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* she \w wept|strong="G2799"\w*, she stooped \w down|strong="G3879"\w*, \add and looked\add* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w sepulchre|strong="G3419"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w seeth|strong="G2334"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w white|strong="G3022"\w* \w sitting|strong="G2516"\w*, the \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w at|strong="G4314"\w* the \w head|strong="G2776"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w other|strong="G1520"\w* \w at|strong="G4314"\w* the \w feet|strong="G4228"\w*, \w where|strong="G3699"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* had \w lain|strong="G2749"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G1565"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Woman|strong="G1135"\w*, \w why|strong="G5101"\w* weepest \w thou|strong="G2799"\w*? She \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Because|strong="G3754"\w* they have taken \w away|strong="G0142"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* I \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w where|strong="G4226"\w* they have \w laid|strong="G5087"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when she \w had|strong="G2036"\w* \w thus|strong="G5023"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, she turned \w herself|strong="G4762"\w* \w back|strong="G3694"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saw|strong="G2334"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w standing|strong="G2476"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w knew|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* it \w was|strong="G2076"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Woman|strong="G1135"\+w*, \+w why|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w weepest thou|strong="G2799"\+w*? \+w whom|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w seekest thou|strong="G2212"\+w*?\wj* \w She|strong="G1565"\w*, \w supposing|strong="G1380"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* to \w be|strong="G2076"\w* the \w gardener|strong="G2780"\w*, \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Sir|strong="G2962"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* have \w borne|strong="G0941"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w hence|strong="G0941"\w*, \w tell|strong="G2036"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w where|strong="G4226"\w* thou hast \w laid|strong="G5087"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w I|strong="G2504"\w* will \w take|strong="G0142"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w away|strong="G0142"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Mary|strong="G3137"\+w*.\wj* She turned \w herself|strong="G4762"\w*, and \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Rabboni|strong="G4462"\w*; \w which|strong="G3739"\w* is to \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Master|strong="G1320"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Touch|strong="G0680"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w*; \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w I am|strong="G0305"\+w* \+w not yet|strong="G3768"\+w* \+w ascended|strong="G0305"\+w* \+w to|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w go|strong="G4198"\+w* \+w to|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w brethren|strong="G0080"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w say|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w unto them|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w I ascend|strong="G0305"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+add to\+add* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*.\wj*

\w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w Magdalene|strong="G3094"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* and \w told|strong="G0518"\w* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* she had \w seen|strong="G3708"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add that\add* he had \w spoken|strong="G2036"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* unto \w her|strong="G0846"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="G3767"\w* the \w same|strong="G1565"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* at \w evening|strong="G3798"\w*, \w being|strong="G5607"\w* the \w first|strong="G1520"\w* \add day\add* of the \w week|strong="G4521"\w*, \w when|strong="G2532"\w* the \w doors|strong="G2374"\w* were \w shut|strong="G2808"\w* \w where|strong="G3699"\w* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w assembled|strong="G4863"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* the \w midst|strong="G3319"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Peace|strong="G1515"\+w* \+add be\+add* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when he \w had|strong="G5124"\w* \w so|strong="G5124"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, he \w shewed|strong="G1166"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \add his\add* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w side|strong="G4125"\w*. \w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w were|strong="G5463"\w* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w glad|strong="G5463"\w*, when they \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* to \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, \wj  \+w Peace|strong="G1515"\+w* \+add be\+add* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*: \+w as|strong="G2531"\+w* \+add my\+add* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w hath sent|strong="G0649"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*, \+w even so|strong="G2504"\+w* \+w send I|strong="G3992"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when he had \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w*, he breathed \w on|strong="G1720"\w* \add them\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Receive ye|strong="G2983"\+w* \+w the Holy|strong="G0040"\+w* \+w Ghost|strong="G4151"\+w*:\wj*

\wj  \+w Whose|strong="G0302"\+w* \+w soever|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w sins|strong="G0266"\+w* \+w ye remit|strong="G0863"\+w*, \+w they are remitted|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w unto them|strong="G0846"\+w*; \+add and\+add* \+w whose|strong="G0302"\+w* \+w soever|strong="G5100"\+w* \+add sins\+add* \+w ye retain|strong="G2902"\+w*, \+w they are retained|strong="G2902"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Thomas|strong="G2381"\w*, \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w*, \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w Didymus|strong="G1324"\w*, \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w*.

The \w other|strong="G0243"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, We have \w seen|strong="G3708"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*. \w But|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Except|strong="G1437"\w* I shall \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* the \w print|strong="G5179"\w* of the \w nails|strong="G2247"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w put|strong="G0906"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w finger|strong="G1147"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w print|strong="G5179"\w* of the \w nails|strong="G2247"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w thrust|strong="G0906"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w side|strong="G4125"\w*, I \w will|strong="G4100"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w eight|strong="G3638"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w within|strong="G2080"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Thomas|strong="G2381"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \add then\add* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, the \w doors|strong="G2374"\w* being \w shut|strong="G2808"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* the \w midst|strong="G3319"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w Peace|strong="G1515"\+w* \+add be\+add* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*.\wj*

\w Then|strong="G1534"\w* saith \w he|strong="G3004"\w* to \w Thomas|strong="G2381"\w*, \wj  \+w Reach|strong="G5342"\+w* \+w hither|strong="G5602"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w finger|strong="G1147"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w behold|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w hands|strong="G5495"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w reach hither|strong="G5342"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w hand|strong="G5495"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w thrust|strong="G0906"\+w* \+add it\+add* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w side|strong="G4125"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w be|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w faithless|strong="G0571"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w believing|strong="G4103"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Thomas|strong="G2381"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w My|strong="G3450"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Thomas|strong="G2381"\+w*, \+w because|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w thou hast seen|strong="G3708"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*, \+w thou hast believed|strong="G4100"\+w*: \+w blessed|strong="G3107"\+w* \+add are\+add* \+w they that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w have|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w seen|strong="G1492"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+add yet\+add* \+w have believed|strong="G4100"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w other|strong="G0243"\w* \w signs|strong="G4592"\w* \w truly|strong="G3303"\w* \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* in the presence \w of|strong="G1799"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w book|strong="G0975"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w these|strong="G5023"\w* are \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye might \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w believing|strong="G4100"\w* ye might \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w*.
